analysis: The project currently has a basic HTML structure with some CSS and JavaScript files. The theme is not yet implemented, and there are no specific UI elements related to black holes or animated slides. The existing to-dos suggest that the project needs to be updated with a black hole theme, animations, and interactive elements.

improvements.description: Add sections for black hole information, animated slides, and interactive elements. Include a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon.
Implement a dark, cosmic theme with animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. Use Egyptian-themed color palette and UI elements.

Add event listeners and functionality for the new buttons added in test-website/index.html. Implement mobile menu toggle functionality with proper event handling, smooth transitions, and user-friendly interactions.
